email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Connor,

We are pleased to offer mv SEA HORIZON for your 75,000MT coal cargo ex Newcastle to Shanghai.
Rate: USD 22 per MT FOB basis.
Laycan: 15-20 November.
NYPE terms with demurrage USD 20,000/day.

Kind regards,
Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Can you revise to USD 19 per MT?

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

We can offer USD 20 per MT as a revised rate. Owners are keen on this business and hope to finalize soon.

Kind regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

USD 20 is still above our budget. We have alternative options at USD 18.50. Can you match or improve this?

Regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Final offer: USD 19.50 per MT. This is our best and final rate. Please advise soonest as the laycan is approaching.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

We accept USD 19.50 per MT. Please send the recap for confirmation.

Regards,
Sarah
